dc:title: Advent Is A Time of Waiting Dorothy Day 1948, pp. 166-175. Reflects on the role of silence during the liturgical season of Advent as necessary for hearing the Word in our souls. Says it is a time to examine one's conscience and a time "to see only what is loveable."
